Package co.cask.cdap.api.log

Interfaces and classes related to logging.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    LogMarkerFilter  
    LogMessage  
    LogQuery
    Defines log messages to select.
    LogService
    Provides access to log messages.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ContainsMarkerFilter
    Filter that checks if specific marker exists in log message.
    LogMarkerFilterList
    Implementation of LogMarkerFilter that represents an ordered List of LogMarkerFilter which will be evaluated with a specified boolean operator LogMarkerFilterList.Operator.MUST_PASS_ALL (!AND) or LogMarkerFilterList.Operator.MUST_PASS_ONE (!OR).
    LogQueryBuilder
    Builds LogQuery.
    LogServiceClientExample  
    SystemLoggerConstants  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    LogMarkerFilterList.Operator
    Set operator.
    LogMessage.LogLevel  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    LogServiceException
    This exception is thrown for logging errors.
    UnsupportedLogQueryException
